title: Mini-Ep 146: Reach For The Stars
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 146: Reach For The Stars
itunes:subtitle: Kate discovers nail concealer and Doree learns how to give great gifts. Then hear from listeners about the power of Dolly Parton, get more menstrual cup tips, and send a long-distance dedication to an astronaut! Activity of the Day: Stargaz...
description:
Kate discovers nail concealer and Doree learns how to give great gifts. Then hear from listeners about the power of Dolly Parton, get more menstrual cup tips, and send a long-distance dedication to an astronaut! 


Activity of the Day: Stargazing!


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

  • BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • e.l.f. - Go to elfcosmetics.com/f35 and use promo code F35 to get 25% off your e.l.f. purchase of $40 or more!
  • SWEATY BETTY - Now through November 1st get TWENTY PERCENT OFF your ENTIRE purchase when you visit sweatybetty.com/FOREVER35. 
  • Marriage & Martinis - Listen to Marriage & Martinis wherever you get your podcasts!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
